The Textual User Interface (TUI) package implements the curses mode interface.

JCheckBoxMenuItem A menu item that can be selected or deselected.

TextualUI The Class TextualUI.
 

Package org.patrodyne.etl.transformio.tui Description

The Textual User Interface (TUI) package implements the curses mode interface. It extends the transformation engine to enable execution of a 'tio' batch either as in-memory debug mode or an actual run. This mode requires a Charva library.
